title: Ticket #5685: Don't build VOMS if not building Globus
description:
Our cmake build scripts attempt to build VOMS even if the user disabled Globus support. This has tripped up folks attempting to build HTCondor.

Patch HTCondor so if Globus is disabled, don't bother with VOMS.
